about.name: The following questions are from real DMV written tests. These are some of the actual permit questions you will face in California. Each permit practice test question has three answer choices. Select one answer for each question and select "grade this section." You can find this button at the bottom of the drivers license quiz.  For a complete list of questions and answers for California please visit https://cheat-sheets.dmv-written-test.com/en/california/car.

hasPart.name: This yellow warning sign means:
hasPart.assesses: This yellow warning sign means: | This yellow warning sign means: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: This sign is placed on roads near schools to warn drivers to slow down, drive with caution, and watch for children.

suggestedAnswer.text: You are approaching a school or school crosswalk.

comment.text: You are approaching a school or school crosswalk.

suggestedAnswer.text: Slow down, drive with caution, and watch for children.

comment.text: Slow down, drive with caution, and watch for children.

answerExplanation.text: This sign is placed on roads near schools to warn drivers to slow down, drive with caution, and watch for children.

comment.text: This yellow warning sign means: | This sign is placed on roads near schools to warn drivers to slow down, drive with caution, and watch for children.

hasPart.name: Fines in a construction zone are:

about.name: Fines in a construction zone are:

hasPart.assesses: Fines in a construction zone are: | Fines in a construction zone are: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Fines for moving traffic violations are doubled in highway construction or maintenance zones where workers are present. When operating in a construction zone, you must drive carefully and follow all directions provided by signs, signals, officers, and flaggers.

answerExplanation.text: Fines for moving traffic violations are doubled in highway construction or maintenance zones where workers are present. When operating in a construction zone, you must drive carefully and follow all directions provided by signs, signals, officers, and flaggers.

comment.text: Fines in a construction zone are: | Fines for moving traffic violations are doubled in highway construction or maintenance zones where workers are present. When operating in a construction zone, you must drive carefully and follow all directions provided by signs, signals, officers, and flaggers.

hasPart.name: Hydroplaning occurs when tires ride on a thin film of water instead of on the surface of the road. To prevent hydroplaning in rainy weather, you should:

about.name: Hydroplaning occurs when tires ride on a thin film of water instead of on the surface of the road. To prevent hydroplaning in rainy weather, you should:

hasPart.assesses: Hydroplaning occurs when tires ride on a thin film of water instead of on the surface of the road. To prevent hydroplaning in rainy weather, you should: | Hydroplaning occurs when tires ride on a thin film of water instead of on the surface of the road. To prevent hydroplaning in rainy weather, you should: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: In rainy weather, you should lower your speed to reduce the risk of hydroplaning. Driving too fast may cause your tires to ride up on the water and lose contact with the surface of the road, making it very difficult to control your vehicle.

suggestedAnswer.text: Put on your cruise control to maintain a constant speed.

comment.text: Put on your cruise control to maintain a constant speed.

suggestedAnswer.text: Move to the shoulder of the road as soon as it starts to rain.

comment.text: Move to the shoulder of the road as soon as it starts to rain.

answerExplanation.text: In rainy weather, you should lower your speed to reduce the risk of hydroplaning. Driving too fast may cause your tires to ride up on the water and lose contact with the surface of the road, making it very difficult to control your vehicle.

comment.text: Hydroplaning occurs when tires ride on a thin film of water instead of on the surface of the road. To prevent hydroplaning in rainy weather, you should: | In rainy weather, you should lower your speed to reduce the risk of hydroplaning. Driving too fast may cause your tires to ride up on the water and lose contact with the surface of the road, making it very difficult to control your vehicle.

hasPart.name: A flashing red traffic light at an intersection means:

about.name: A flashing red traffic light at an intersection means:

hasPart.assesses: A flashing red traffic light at an intersection means: | A flashing red traffic light at an intersection means: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: A flashing red signal means "stop." After coming to a stop, you may proceed once it is safe, observing all right-of-way rules.

suggestedAnswer.text: Stop and wait for the green light.

comment.text: Stop and wait for the green light.

answerExplanation.text: A flashing red signal means "stop." After coming to a stop, you may proceed once it is safe, observing all right-of-way rules.

comment.text: A flashing red traffic light at an intersection means: | A flashing red signal means "stop." After coming to a stop, you may proceed once it is safe, observing all right-of-way rules.

hasPart.name: On freezing, wet days, which of the following roadways is most likely to hide spots of ice?

about.name: On freezing, wet days, which of the following roadways is most likely to hide spots of ice?

hasPart.assesses: On freezing, wet days, which of the following roadways is most likely to hide spots of ice? | On freezing, wet days, which of the following roadways is most likely to hide spots of ice? -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Bridges and overpasses tend to freeze before the rest of the road does. They can hide spots of ice.

suggestedAnswer.text: Roadways near the tops of hills

comment.text: Roadways near the tops of hills

answerExplanation.text: Bridges and overpasses tend to freeze before the rest of the road does. They can hide spots of ice.

comment.text: On freezing, wet days, which of the following roadways is most likely to hide spots of ice? | Bridges and overpasses tend to freeze before the rest of the road does. They can hide spots of ice.

hasPart.name: In inclement weather, you should:
hasPart.assesses: In inclement weather, you should: | In inclement weather, you should: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: When driving during unfavorable weather conditions, avoid slamming on the brakes and making sharp, quick turns. These behaviors will make controlling your vehicle in inclement weather even more difficult.

answerExplanation.text: When driving during unfavorable weather conditions, avoid slamming on the brakes and making sharp, quick turns. These behaviors will make controlling your vehicle in inclement weather even more difficult.

comment.text: In inclement weather, you should: | When driving during unfavorable weather conditions, avoid slamming on the brakes and making sharp, quick turns. These behaviors will make controlling your vehicle in inclement weather even more difficult.
